website_summaries.verdict: Fussy babies feel cozy and comfortable in these velvety sheets. The fit is more appropriate for older babies than newborns.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Provides a looser fit that's more appropriate for older infants

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT AND PLUSHY!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this fitted sheet already. I just took it out of the dryer and put it on. He wanted to go in his crib immediately to play on it! It's super soft, cozy and plushy. This is exactly what I needed for the cold nights since he doesn't sleep with a blanket. It a bit baggy on this mattress but the elastic is so secure I don't see it moving anywhere. I may buy a memory foam topper to fill in the extra material. All in all very excited for my little guy to habe a great night's sleep on this sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for your little one!!
customer_reviews.text: My 1yr old daughter absolutely loves these sheets. She sleeps so good every night with these compared to regular cotton ones. They are super soft and comfy which is great for those hard plastic crib mattresses! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: So snuggy buggy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these sheets! They are so soft and snuggly, which is especially important to me because he cannot have blankets yet. They wash easily, and almost seem to be ‘deep pocket’ sheets- so they wrap around the crib mattress very well! So happy I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: hgail

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: This sheets are super soft. I bought three, one for my toddler and two for my newborn who prefers to sleep in a soft sheet. I have washed them many times in gentle cycle and drying and they seem to hold pretty well. The only complaint I have is that the hem and elastic don’t look very durable. The cloth is nice and it looks that is going to last a long time so why not put a thicker hem and elastic? So far pleased, baby sleeps in his crib all night and my toddler just started to use her toddler bed after co-sleeping with me for more than two years.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Fits regular crib and soft for winter sleep
customer_reviews.text: Easy to throw in the washer and dryer. My baby loves this in the winter as it is soft and does not get cold as a normal cotton sheet would. Recommend for winter sheet. Fits regular crib perfectly. I do not use it in the summer as when it is hot, it makes my baby hotter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luxury Baby Sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft!!! My favorite part is they fit my daughters crib mattress snuggly. I have had issues with cotton sheets stretching out over time because she has epilepsy and jerks a lot at night causing them to loosen or roll up on the sides. Not with this one! I’ll be ordering many many more!!! Also the pink is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 month old daughter. She was scratching her other crib sheets and making noises on it. It also seemed like the other cotton ones were cold when I layer her down. This one is so soft and she seems to sleep better with this one.
customer_reviews.author: mjc

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves them
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are an important part of my baby's bedtime! She uses the soft material to help self soothe, and she loves to rub her face on these. They fit the standard mattress well, but as baby is a side sleeper, we roll up blankets underneath the sheets to give her back support ( and something to snuggle into). These sheets have enough room to slip those extra rolls underneath while still fitting well. We have these for both the crib and pack n play
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. They dip down to $12 or so, depending on the color. Well worth the price. Great for larger mattresses that cheap sheets don’t seem to fit. So soft and cozy for toddlers. Very plush and the colors hold up in the wash and do not put off a lot of lint like cheap plush things do, so it can be washed with the rest of the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Regret purchasing this sheet
customer_reviews.text: After I washed this fitted sheet it started shedding everywhere. I had to clean up a handful of loose lint. Although the product is very soft I’m extremely disappointed because it is shedding everywhere- on to whatever my baby is wearing and after he sleeps I even find lint balls stuck in his hair or on his face. Don’t waste your time or money on this product. I’m ready to toss this in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog!
customer_reviews.text: Switched to crib mattress for dog bed, and wish I did that long ago. Cushion and quality beyond most high-end dog beds at half the price; endless options for crib-sheet covers to match decor; and so easy to keep clean. These cozy sheets are dog's favorite and are super easy to wash and dry (by hand/air or machine).
customer_reviews.author: PDX123

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sheets! As a first time parent, I purchased these sheets based on all of the positive reviews and am so happy I did. I ordered 3 sets! These are the softest most durable sheets we have. They fit the crib mattress perfectly, do not shrink in the wash and are SO SOFT! My only complaint is that they don't come in king size for our bed! I have recommended them to all of my mom friends. Don't hesitate. Buy these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: KnB2013

customer_reviews.title: So soft...I wish I had one!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this crib sheet for about a week now. Our little one just takes all of his naps in the crib at this point, but so far, he seems to sleep as well or better on this than he has on his Aiden and Anais muslin crib sheet. It is so soft and the grey/white honeycomb pattern really looks good with his white crib and pale gray walls. I washed this on cold and dried without heat, and the sheet fits our standard crib mattress (from BuyBuyBaby) perfectly. Absolutely no need to worry about extra fabric bunching up anywhere. Thinking I may order the turquoise one next! :)
customer_reviews.author: DanC

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old wouldn't sleep in his crib (or at all) without some sort of lounger pillow (Snuggle me organic) until we got these sheets! The very first night we put them on he fell right to sleep and slept for 10 hours! He loves the feel of soft blankets against his face in order to fall asleep so we'd let him fall asleep holding his stuffed bunny/blanket and then take it from him when he fell asleep. We ended up not even having to give him his bunny with these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Softness puts toddler back to sleep
customer_reviews.text: Can't say how durable these will be but they're super soft. My baby rubs them to put herself back to sleep, which amazes me because she has never been a good sleeper. Worth a try if you have a baby who hates sleep.
customer_reviews.author: J.Maye

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this for my baby. But unfortunately whenever its on his bed he slides all over it, its soo slippery, he always ends up sideways with his head against the crib bumper and wakes up in the middle of the night crying and upset. It could just be I have a really wiggly baby but I had high hopes for this. It feels really soft and cozy but I just use my regular crib sheets because he doesn't slide around as easy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bedding!
customer_reviews.text: First off, the color is truly as bright and orange as listed, which is rare to see. It’s so stinkin soft I want to climb into the crib w my son. I’ve washed this bad boy like, 30 times already and each time IT IS STILL JUST AS SOFT. So, needless to say, it makes a great gift and it holds up to its value. Perfect for the winter time since my son doesn’t use a blanket yet. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Novak

customer_reviews.title: Saved my baby girl's skin while teething!
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl is teething now at 6 months, and when she is uncomfortable from the teething pain, she flips over in her crib and rubs her cheeks and legs into the crib sheet. The crib sheet is pure cotton, but it's too rough for her delicate skin right now as she wakes in the morning with bright red irritated cheeks and knees. I found this sheet and took a chance on ordering it-so glad I did! I wish they made adult versions of these sheets because they really are heavenly soft and super comfy. Saved my baby's skin while she is teething!
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Improved sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these sheets after realizing that the cotton sheet on LO's waterproof mattress was part of the sleep problem. It was just too cold and didn't do anything to dampen the sound of the crinkly mattress. These sheets are so soft and warm. The mattress isn't heard nearly as much with these, either! They also clean very well - LO spit up some carrots after a nap one day and the sheet didn't make it into the wash until that evening. I just pre-treated and you'd never know anything was ever there. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nope

customer_reviews.title: Softest dreamiest crib sheet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a winter crib fitted sheet for our third child. Our other fleece crib sheets were pretty worn. Right away, I was impressed with the quality. It is feathery soft. The baby even runs her hands across it. I would love a sheet like this for my own bed. Very pleased with this purchase. Would definitely recommend. The color is just as pictured. It arrived timely.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Why did I ONLY just find these?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I ONLY just find out about these soft fleece crib sheets?!?! This is my 3rd baby and I’ve always had those thin fitted crib sheets and I always had to lay soft blankets down (I know...not baby friendly) because I felt like it was so cold and uncomfortable. I bought 3 of these and it was the best decision ever!!! My baby is 6 months old now but better late than never!! Don’t hesitate to purchase these if you want thick, soft, comfortable fitted crib sheets for your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOOOOO Soft!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My little one is almost 2 and still loves her crib! We need some new sheets and with Babies R US out of business I decided to look on Amazon. The reviews are not wrong, this crib is sooooooo soft (I wish they made kind size sheets!). The first time my daughter laid on she looked like she making snow angels rubbing the sheet over and over again! The colors are really pretty too! I highly recommend these for any baby. Also some reviews said they issue with shedding in the wash, but we have had no issues like that so far (washed twice).
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Super soft. Love the material and it feels cushioned as well. Perfect for winter. I got the grey and white honeycomb and the print is much more contrasted than they show in pics- not a bad thing- but at first I thought it might stimulate baby too much when trying to fall asleep but it’s fine in the dark. I’ll get another but probably a solid color one. The print is nice, just bold. Some people may prefer that so no Star deducted.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies and toddlers who like to sleep on their bellies
customer_reviews.text: Our son LOVES this crib sheet! He likes to sleep on his belly and snuggle into his mattress, but his cotton sheets were too rough on his face. These have been perfect! They’re incredibly soft, easy to wash, quick to dry, and perfect for snuggling. We’re buying another set for our next baby so they each have their own. We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Insured Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Best Crib Sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you all that these are by far the best crib sheets I have found yet! They are so incredibly soft/plush and fit the crib mattress perfectly! I've bought several other 'name-brand' crib sheets that I've had to return because they don't fit the crib mattress and look baggy, but these fit so well it's almost as if they have been tailored/custom made for the bed. I ordered 3 more in the pink so that I have 4 crib sheets total (some as back-up). I've washed all of them with no issues at all. They don't seem to shrink, maintain their color, dry nicely, and don't leave lint anywhere! Great purchase and I would recommend them to anyone/everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if it weren't for someone's hair all over it.
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets but they came already open or used. SO gross when you're getting something for your baby. Giant black hair across top of stuffed back in package sheet. I don't understand how this keeps happening with Amazon. Makes you not want to purchase online. No quality control checks. I feel like I'm always getting pre tested products. Insert green face here.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly soft
customer_reviews.text: When it says heavenly soft it means it. These sheets are super cozy and fit easily, but nicely, and snug as they should be. Baby seems a lot more comfortable on these vs regular sheets. Bought due to all the good reviews vs other cheaper versions and i was not disappointed. Also arrived very quickly without trouble. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft sleep
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is coincidence, maybe it's these sheets. My daughter absolutely loves them. She began sleeping hour long + naps (up from 20-30 minutes) with this sheet. She even crawls to her crib the pet it through the slats when playing in her room. It's soooo soft. She's 9 months now and I wish I had these from the beginning
customer_reviews.author: Ikamador

customer_reviews.title: Soooo soft! My son loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler son has always slept with a very soft blanket underneath him, tucked tightly around his pack n play mattress. We recently started the transition to a big boy toddler bed and I wanted to recreate that soft feeling for him. I found these sheets and they definitely do the trick! They are very nicely made, super soft, and my son loves them. I purchased the gray chevron and they are adorable. I plan to get several more!
customer_reviews.author: KC77

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and fits the crib mattress perfect
customer_reviews.text: This sheet has been a miracle sheet for us in helping transition our now 11 month old back into her crib all night. After the 1st night we put it on she has been sleeping through the night until 630am every night. We didn't change anything other than the sheet. Highly recommend. Fits tight and perfect in the mattress and is so incredibly soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tug fam

customer_reviews.title: Daughter slept better with these sheets
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to help my daughter sleep through the night again!! She is a year old and was waking up a lot. I was running out of ideas..Thought maybe some comfy and plush sheets might help trick her into thinking she was sleeping next to us still....It didn't solve the issue entirely but it helped!!! First night she sleep much longer than she had been for weeks...its a win in my books. Plus it's held up several times in the wash already.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Beth Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are like velvet! Nice thick material perfect for cold winters. The color may not be what others expect. It’s more of a marigold/mustard vs true yellow. Worked perfectly for what I needed. Fits the full size crib mattress well. Update May 17, 2020: Purchased a second sheet so I have a backup. Recommend them to all the new moms I know.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Soft luxurious sheets for baby!
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute softest sheets - they’re amazing! They have deep pockets so they’re very securely wrapped around the crib mattress. Easy to clean in washer with cold water and dryer. I bought a generic brand previously and they did not have deep pockets so they barely gripped the mattress - I was always worried so these sheets are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves the softness
customer_reviews.text: Our baby's room is very cold. I got tired of her along up every time I laid her down on the cold sheets! I actually bought these on impulse in the middle of one particularly difficult night. The results have been fantastic. She loves the softness of the sheet and actually nuzzles her face against them when I lay her down. The room is still cold, but at least she isn't waking the second I put her in bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Shiree

customer_reviews.title: So super soft and plush!
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is amazing. I literally never review anything but a good crib sheet is hard to find. We practice safe sleep (nothing in her crib but a tight fitted sheet) and something a little thicker and plush was what I was looking for. The other ones I bought were paper thin. I opened this and was so excited! She is two months old and sleeps great but this may help even more! I’m extremely happy with this purchase ♥️ I need to get at least one more for switching out for spit up or a blow out lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I would love an adult sized mattress sheet
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this crib sheet for my two older boys. This crib sheet is so soft!!! Honestly I would love an adult sized mattress sheet :) After having my baby girl on this heavenly sheet, our Target crib sheets went into the "donate" pile! My baby girl has eczema on her cheeks & I know this soft sheet is gentle to the touch & not rough on her skin. And it washes & dries easily! No problems with it shrinking! I love these sheets so much it is going to be one of my staples I will gift for new mommies!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2Three

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Bed Cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I actually use this to cover my dog's bed so that I can take the cover off really simply and wash it each week. This isn't the thickest cover I have seen, but it is holding up really well being washed weekly and tromped around on by a 70 pound dog :)
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally comfortable crib sheet. More colors please
customer_reviews.text: This crib sheet is amazing. It's best quality has to be the softness as it truly is heavenly soft. This feels great in the winter and you know your child is comfortable which is reassuring. It washes very well and always comes out looking as new. I have the gray color and it has not faded in the 6 months it has been in use. I wish they had more colors. At first I ordered Ecru which is supposed to be a brownish/cream color, but it was more of a yellow/cream so I sent it back and ordered the gray which works, but I wish they had a lighter solid gray.
customer_reviews.author: Leecy87

customer_reviews.title: Picked these up when other moms wrote how it helped ...
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up when other moms wrote how it helped their kids to sleep. Well, my son had been waking a lot at night before and recently when he wakes he puts himself right back down. Conincidence? I have no clue but I wish the sheets came in queen size too! Very soft.
customer_reviews.author: AliKat

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheet
customer_reviews.text: My son would always wake up as soon as we layed him in his crib because he was used to laying either in our arms or on a soft surface. Without the option of putting a soft blanket under him, I went to Google in search of an alternative which led me to these sheets. He loves them and sleeps soundly! My only issue with the sheet is that it doesn't stretch large enough to securely go around the mattress. I imagine when he becomes more mobile, it will come out from around the mattress with his movement.
customer_reviews.author: sammyXshay

customer_reviews.title: So soft!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has wanted a fleece blanket over and u set him for a while. These are awesome!!! Incredibly soft. Beautiful colors holds up well in the wash. No signs of pilling and doesn’t seem possible to pill. Plenty deep to stay in mattress! Love love love 100 washes from now either. Worth the little splurge! Only regret - wish it came in more patterns and colors!!! Will prob buy a 3rd for variety!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Hollrith

customer_reviews.title: SO soft!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely looked everywhere trying to find a mint green fleece crib sheet. The "chenille" is just as soft as the fleece. And the mint green is the perfect color - nice soft mint green. Soft in color and texture. I just ordered another!
customer_reviews.author: MJN

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm to the touch
customer_reviews.text: Every time I put my baby down on regular sheets, the coolness of then woke him up. Every. Single. Time. These sheets are soft and warm to the touch, making for a much smoother bedtime. Quality and fit were both good. I have a total of 4 of these sheets now in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: KatwithAC

customer_reviews.title: Very stingy sellers
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are awesome. My problem is with the seller who limits the purchase to a quantity of only two from both sellers. Other people ordered more for me so you accomplished nothing by limiting the quantity sold. Stupid policy accomplishes nothing.
customer_reviews.author: SUNCATCHER

customer_reviews.title: Magic sheet, perhaps?
customer_reviews.text: Now I don’t think this is a magic sheet but I definitely think it helped our 7 month old sleep better. Coupled with a knotted bumper, paper black out shades and a sound machine, his naps went from 30 minutes to an hour and now they’re 2 hours long! Definitely recommend, it’s sooo soft.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and feel. After multiple washes, it still remains pretty soft and durable. My 7 month old seems to like it much better than the other brand sheets I have. I got these just in time because he actually likes to sleep on his face. I'll probably order more colors. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Yam

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize the material for these sheets were so ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the material for these sheets were so thick almost fleece-like. When my daughter used them the material would make her hair knot badly. She normally has very silky hair so I thought it was odd. Eventually I put 2 and 2 together and realized it was the sheets. Needless to say we don't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is so soft! I believe it bought me 2 hours of sleep from my 2 month old in his crib, when he had previously only done 20 minutes max. I washed it once and it held up fine, can’t speak for long term yet but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: Warm to the touch
customer_reviews.text: Great sheet for winter. It's warm to the touch so when I lay baby in the crib he doesn't wake up feeling a cold sheet. Washes great and matches the crib rail covers I purchased of the same color and material.
customer_reviews.author: Thompsolonian

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and easy to clean, really helps with sheet shock (when putting sleeping babies on cold sheets) as my sons don’t wake up when I initially put them down anymore. Oldest has been sick three times on these sheets and they were very easily cleaned which was a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Fits a standard crib mattress perfectly and looks beautiful! The purple is such a soft color, perfect for a little girls room! These are so soft! I plan on buying a few more colors! So nice for winter!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Leinum

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping through the night!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST crib sheet you will ever have for your baby! It is the PERFECT amount of soft and fuzzy. This was what finally helped my son sleep through the night! Before he goes to sleep, he rubs it with his little fingers and his cheeks. I just wish they made it in twin size for when he transitions to a toddler bed :(
customer_reviews.author: kd

customer_reviews.title: Fits Dream On Me Mini Crib perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This sheet fits a mini crib mattress perfectly. It came with a chemical smell, and I was in a hurry to use it, so I washed it by hand with Dawn dish detergent. After throwing it in the dryer on low, it came out with no smell and with no shedding. Very pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: GreatNorthWoods

customer_reviews.title: Your baby needs this!
customer_reviews.text: Your baby will sleep in comfort. As we all know, we cannot use blankets, bumpers, pillows or have anything else in the crib that could be a potentiall hazard to your baby. So how to make sure your baby is warm, use these sheets. Even in the summer days the AC is on and makes standard sheets feel like icicles, heavenly soft i just what the baby needs. So touch of warmth and gentle hug. Great buy. Will get one more in a different color so when one is im the wash i have the other to use immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Beki R

customer_reviews.title: This is the only crib sheet you’ll ever need
customer_reviews.text: This crib sheet is awesome. It’s so soft and is great quality. I had the baby who would not transition to the crib, we had the hardest time getting him to sleep in there. This sheet definitely helped soothe him. I would watch him on the monitor after putting him down, just brushing his hand along the sheet until he fell asleep. I also love that it’s not cold when I lay him on it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Item decent, price insane
customer_reviews.text: Soft, nice blue lavender, but majorly, majorly overpriced. Not pleased for that reason. Most ABC products are reasonably priced so I don't know what is wrong with this one. $20 for one damn crib sheet is ridiculous, should be a 3 pack!
customer_reviews.author: Ciarrai

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and last forever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these since my 2 girls were baby’s and they are 3 and 4 now. They’ve held up great through millions of washes and stay soft. Color has never faded or changed and they love their sheets.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My baby isn’t here yet so she hasn’t gotten a chance to sleep on it but it is so soft and I think it will be warm. The color is a very pretty soft mint and just what I was wanting. It seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Luke M

customer_reviews.title: My son now loves his bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had been having issues getting our 2 and a half year old son to sleep on his bed. We bought this to see if having something soft would help. And It Did!!! This sheet is truly super soft. Now our son gets in his bed all on his own because he loves it so much. Definitely recommend especially for those little ones that just don't want to be in their beds.
customer_reviews.author: Cassarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Aqua Sea Wave sheet. It is very soft and my baby loves it. She loves soft fabric. The color of the sheet was a darker tone of Aqua. It almost looks like a green. But, it matched very well with the mermaid theme I am doing for my baby's room. I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer - soooo soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the American Baby Company sheets in the cotton with a print and they have been long-wearing, colour-fast and provide great vibrant prints. Whereas the cotton sheets were not as soft straight from the package, these are super soft and stretchy. So wonderful for my toddler in winter. The grey-hexagon print is quite bold but I really like it. I think it is unisex but some may prefer the style for a boy. I have a European toddler bed - longer in length. The deep wall of this sheet and the stretch make for a wonderful fit. I purchased 3 of these sheets and I know I will get many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nifty

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: My baby’s crib always felt cold laying him down on his cotton sheets, he seems to like laying his head on these much more and stays down better when I put him back after a feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chiaradia

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo soft
customer_reviews.text: This is such a soft sheet. I was worried if the color was accurate to the product picture but turns out it was spot on. Love the color! The one con is that this material sticks to animal fur so it’s hard to get all the cat hair off after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and comfy. Deep pockets.
customer_reviews.text: The baby loves this sheet! It’s super soft and cozy! We will definitely be buying more! It’s also deeper than most crib sheets and fits great over his crib mattress topper and crib mattress. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft these are! They are also warmer than cotton sheets. With the cotton ones, as soon as my sleeping little's head touched it, she woke up. With these, she sleeps soundly!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Baby approves
customer_reviews.text: My baby wouldn’t sleep on regular sheets he would cry all night and wake up so many times in the middle of the night. So I figured out it was the sheets. The regular sheets would get cold at night and who wants to be cold any lonely at night right? So I found these sheets and I absolutely love it and so does my baby. He sleeps now all night the first night I put it on his bed. I ended up ordering another sheet and will only use this sheet. So thank you seller !
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft and Cuddly!!
customer_reviews.text: What child wouldn't love cuddling up to a super soft" Blankie". Especially in the winter when cold sheets can be so harsh to a child you are trying to get down to sleep! Better sleep/better life (for all).
customer_reviews.author: Christine W

customer_reviews.title: So soft, baby finally sleeps like a baby
customer_reviews.text: My 5-month-old had a difficult time sleeping. She would be sound asleep, but when we put her in the crib, she would wake up startled. She would sleep like a baby if we put her beside us on the soft couch, so we tried getting rid of her cold cotton sheet and got this instead. She loves it! It is so soft, she likes to run her hand over it and it seems to soothe her. She stays asleep now when we put her in the crib and she sleeps longer. I bought a second one because I want to make sure there is always one for her to sleep on, so I can finally get some sleep too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love this little crib sheet
customer_reviews.text: Love this little crib sheet! Super soft and held up well in the wash on regular settings (washed it with Dreft detergent, fabric softener, etc). Would definitely recommend it if you are looking for something warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: definiendum

customer_reviews.title: Best Sheets for Baby!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sheets we've gotten by far! We've gotten about 5-6 sheet sets for our son & he definitely prefers these! They are super soft & cuddly without being too hot! I bought the crib sheets first and loved them so much I got the pack n play version shortly after! We've used them for nearly 8 months and they still look brand new! I also love the grey color its a soft light color that really looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal T.

customer_reviews.title: Ordering my second set 4 years later!
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered these in 2013 when my two boys were babies, and they LOVED them! Now 4 years later, I'm ordering another set of two, but this time for mattress covers for our two giant dogs beds. They've held up so well I don't mind paying for them again. They're super durable and stay on the matresses well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Oleske

customer_reviews.title: I am BLOWN AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews! But I have to on this! My son is 18 months- he’s never slept well. I’ve nursed him to sleep since he’s been born- never self soothed. He would cry and carry on for an hour and a half some nights. I just stumbled upon this crib sheet—- and I don’t know if it’s a fluke or what- but I literally lay him down in his crib and he goes on his face and lays down and snuggles with the sheet! It is absolutely amazing and I will be buying more cuz I can’t live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Blue

customer_reviews.title: Like the product, but disappointed with the item I received
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot--it's really soft, coordinates with the changing pad cover, and it doesn't shrink in the wash. HOWEVER, I received what seemed like either a used or returned item. It had a few small stains which really bothered me since this is going on my baby's bed, but the stains washed out, luckily. I decided it wasn't worth the bother to exchange it, but it was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ptoy

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheet worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sheet. I wanted a soft sheet for the transition from cosleeping to crib training. This is perfect. It fits over the entire mattress, it’s still soft after washing. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Warm, soft and cozy.  Our baby has never slept so well
customer_reviews.text: We switched to these sheets when the weather got cold and they were an absolute game changer for our baby being able to get to sleep and stay alseep. Not only are they incredibly soft and cozy, they also "feel warm" so she doesn't get shocked awake by the feeling of cool crisp sheets during the times when we are putting her in her crib after she has already fallen asleep in our warm arms. She loves her crib now and we don't have to take extra steps to warm up her bed before putting her down anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Eillatan

customer_reviews.title: do they make these in a king?
customer_reviews.text: wow so soft! I want to sleep on these they are so soft! I think its really helping my baby be more comfortable in her crib I got this and theand I feel like they go really well adding so much comfort for my baby. She sleeps great on these and we have had no issue whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: ERyser

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT!!
customer_reviews.text: This crib sheet is SO soft! We got it hoping that it would help our little one sleep through the night. While I don't think it helped for that purpose, it is most certainly more comfortable than any other crib sheet he has had and we love the design, as it kind of matches his "under the sea" nursery theme!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Blount

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. My baby was suffering from severely red cheeks from rubbing his face on regular cotton sheets. I got sheets to hopefully fix that problem. These sheets are extremely soft, almost velvet like. They have fixed my baby’s red cheeks problem. My only complaint is that due to the velvet like material it holds onto moisture. If you have a baby that drools a lot you may run into issues with there being wet spots on the sheets. Overall though- good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cozy!
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet is so soft and cozy! With it being winter, I was originally searching for a cute flannel sheet for our crib. I came across this sheet instead (microfiber plush) and it’s anazing! So comfy and cozy and my little guy loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: I sprung for this after I bought the two pack ...
customer_reviews.text: I sprung for this after I bought the two pack of another brand. The other brand falls part but hey its cheaper and you get two. Here you just get the one sheet but it fits my deep crib mattress and not having to tug and tug and tug to get the sheet to fit makes this worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Yvo1234

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: My infant daughter Is attached to a minky blanket someone gave her but it always makes me nervous to have anything in the crib, this sheet was the perfect solution! She can still snuggle against it with no risk!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Soft, good quality elastic
customer_reviews.text: I used baby mattress as a headboard for my daughter's bed and bought this to go on it. It's soft and a nice color and the elastic holds it in place firmly even when I lean against it to read, etc. Not sure how durable it will be when washed, but really like what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and useful
customer_reviews.text: Fits our ikea mattress well, very soft and snuggly, chose yellow to match baby furnishings. Doesnt absorb water much so easy to wipe up with towels when theres a spill/leak. Wash it with all other laundry and still supersoft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Velvety soft!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves petting soft pillows and blankets, so this was a great, safe alternative to have in his crib! Fits our standard crib mattress and we just throw it in the washing mashing when needed.
customer_reviews.author: L. T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sheet! Baby fall asleep quickly when placed down. Also I believes he sleeps longer. Not through the night but sleeps longer so no complaint. Orange looks alot like peach though. I was able to catch a sale with Walmart for $6 from the same company so keep a watch for sale because $19 is a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Made in America
customer_reviews.text: Bought from a Company called American Baby! Really it is made in China. Hate hate that my granddaughter has to sleep on crib sheets made in China!!! Want baby products made in America!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rolling Wheels

customer_reviews.title: Wish these came in King size!
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this sheet after reading other's reviews. I tend to keep my room cold and one reviewer said it stays warm to the touch. This was a huge plus for me as I'd feel terrible putting baby down in a cold hard bed. My 9 year old insists on sleeping in the crib until baby comes next month because the sheet is so soft and cozy. I paid a little extra for the orange color because it matches my decor. I wish all colors were priced the same.
customer_reviews.author: LP82

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever for Cold Nights
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are perfect for our little guy's crib. We live in a cold climate so needed something that would help keep him warm when the nighttime temps drop to -40F. He sleeps through the night and wakes up warm and toasty. They clean really well too without pilling or losing their softness.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyLynne

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I wished they made this sheets in king size because I love the feel of it.. our grandson has a awesome set of sheets. I do recommend these sheet they are truly heavenly sheets
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft crib sheet that helps my son sleep all night
customer_reviews.text: This may be the only reason my son can sleep on his rock hard crib mattress. This sheet is SO soft and one thing I love about it is that it doesn't get cold because of the fabric. You know cotton can get chilly, this just stays the same temperature and it's super comfortable. Buying it in another color! We've had it for 2 months and so far it's held up well after being washed many times.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: These crib sheets are amazingly soft. I swear my toddler has started sleeping better since we started using it. I'll never go back to regular sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper111

customer_reviews.title: you need these mama!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son LOVES these bedsheets. How do I know? Because he doesn't wake up with red cheeks rubbing against stiff cotton crib sheets anymore and he sleeps longer, seriously. Also he never keeps his blanket on, so these are warm enough for him to sleep with minimal clothing on without me worrying about the cold temperature. I ordered them in 3 different colors and I am recommending them to all my mamas! They are especially perfect for the winter, I wish they made these for my bed! Plus they wash well too! The name says it = heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: Zaki

customer_reviews.title: try them, you'll love them
customer_reviews.text: these are the best fitting sheets for my grandsons crib he's ever had. plus they are so soft, I just ordered 2 more . He has just moved & was having a hard time getting used to his new space He had regular sheets on his bed but just screamed all night. I bought these just to see if the softer sheet would make him more comfy. It worked like magic, if our little guy likes them we love them!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Sooo soft and cozy. I do have to say ...
customer_reviews.text: Sooo soft and cozy. I do have to say that they are a bit big over our crib mattress. While usually I find most to be a tight squeeze (even with a plush mattress pad underneath) these I have to pull down bunched fabric through the slats after putting the mattress back in the crib. I purchased the ecru color not sure if anyone else has had this issues. It's just sort of a chore. On the plus side I don't think I'll have issues with the elastic giving out.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Betts

customer_reviews.title: very soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby because all his other sheets felt cold to the touch in this cold weather, even though my house is at 73 degrees. I love the soft feeling and that is does feel cold now.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Perez

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get one for my bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sheet! It's similar in texture to those soft plush throw blankets that are everywhere these days. It's very cozy for my toddler, particularly during this brutally cold winter! I would caution against using it with smaller babies. It fits loosely and tends to create fairly large wrinkles and sometimes slips off. It's not a concern for me with my toddler, but I wouldn't be comfortable with it if he were less than a year old.
customer_reviews.author: SLBoston

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: So soft!! I wanted to find these sheets for my full bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and soft for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter for my grandson (age 1 in a crib) and had them shipped to her. She said she always wanted these but didn't want to spend the extra money so I bought them for my grandson. She said they are perfect, soft, comfy, loves them!
customer_reviews.author: William's textbooks

customer_reviews.title: It really is heavenly soft! Unlike other crib sheets ...
customer_reviews.text: It really is heavenly soft! Unlike other crib sheets which can be very hard to get on, this fits our crib mattress (standard size, not portable size) perfectly without too much extra extra give. My baby is always hot and sweating and even though this is so soft it does not make her sweat.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: The best crib sheet
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly soft even after several washes. They do not absorb heat, so they don't leave baby sweating. My son is 6 months old & since birth has loved rubbing his face all over this sheet. We alternate between the Navy blue & the gray & they are both very pretty. They are very high quality and do not shrink.
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaMamaTop Contributor: Baby

product_meta.title: American Baby Company Heavenly Soft Chenille Fitted Crib Sheet for Standard Crib and Toddler Mattresses, Steel Gray, for Boys and Girls, Pack of 1
product_meta.description: Color:Steel Gray| Size:Pack of 1Our heavenly soft chenille fitted crib sheets fit standard size 28 inch x 52 inch crib mattresses. The ultra soft elegant material is perfect for baby's comfort and is a must have to today's nursery. Available in a variety of colors to mix and match your favorite bedding. Machine wash cold with like colors, tumble dry low for best results.
feature_bullets: 28" X 52" X 9" with 3 panel construction for a smoother fit
9" deep pockets with elastic all around for a snug and secure fit
Luxuriously soft elegant chenille material for baby's comfort
